classJeers.wizard: yer spells be weaker than a gnome’s sneeze!
classJeers.fighter: ye're just swingin’ that sword like a toddler!
classJeers.rogue: I've seen kobolds sneak better than ye!
classJeers.bard: Hope yer better at singin' than ye are at fightin'!
classJeers.cleric: Ye’ll need more than prayers to save yerself from me!
classJeers.ranger: Couldn’t track a snail in a puddle, could ya?
classJeers.paladin: Yer about as noble as a rat in a cheese shop!
classJeers.sorcerer: Is that magic or are ye just wavin’ yer hands about?
classJeers.druid: Talk to the trees, do ya? Bet they tell ye to quit adventurin'!

cityResponses.new: Ah, so ye're fresh to the city, eh? Watch out, the rats here are bigger than you!
cityResponses.not_new: Oh, so ye've been here before? Couldn’t tell from the way yer stumbling around!

locationJeers.weapon_shop: The weapon shop? More like the place ye'll get swindled into buyin’ rusty daggers!
locationJeers.magic_shop: Magic shop? Ha! The only magic there is how they make yer gold disappear!
locationJeers.courthouse: The courthouse? Hope ye like bein' laughed at by a judge!
locationJeers.temple: The temple? What, ye think a prayer's gonna fix yer awful fightin' skills?
locationJeers.inn: The inn? A fine place if ye like bedbugs and thieves!
locationJeers.tavern: The tavern? Ah, yes. The only place worse than yer fightin' is their ale!

classJeers.wizard: I've seen goblin fireworks more powerful than yer spells!
classJeers.fighter: More like a flailer! Ye couldn’t swing yer way out of a tavern brawl!
classJeers.rogue: Ye look more like a lost puppy than a shadowy thief!
classJeers.bard: Sing us a song, then, but not while I’m tryin’ to eat, eh?
classJeers.cleric: Pray all ye want, it won’t save ya from me blade!
classJeers.ranger: Can ye even hit the broadside of a dragon with that bow?
classJeers.paladin: What’s that shiny armor for, eh? To blind yer enemies?
classJeers.sorcerer: Yer magic’s weaker than a goblin's stew!
classJeers.druid: I bet the trees cry whenever they see ya comin’!

cityResponses.new: New to the city? Ye’ll be lucky if ye last a week! Goblins love fresh meat, after all!
cityResponses.not_new: So ye think ye know the city? Then why do ye still look like a lost hatchling?

locationJeers.weapon_shop: The weapon shop? Ye’ll find more danger buyin’ a sword there than usin' it!
locationJeers.magic_shop: Magic shop? More like a shop of cheap tricks and even cheaper potions!
locationJeers.courthouse: Court? Oh, ye'll fit right in—everyone's a fool in there!
locationJeers.temple: Temple? Pfft, ye’ll need a miracle just to find the place!
locationJeers.inn: The inn? Might as well sleep in the stables—at least the rats are friendlier!
locationJeers.tavern: The tavern? Ah, I’d avoid their stew... unless ye like drinkin' mud!

classJeers.wizard: Yer spells couldn't light a candle, let alone a fireball!
classJeers.fighter: Ye look like ye're fightin' with one arm tied behind yer back!
classJeers.rogue: I could smell ye a mile away!
classJeers.bard: Hope yer singin’s better than yer fightin’, or we’re doomed!
classJeers.cleric: Prayin’ fer a better shield next time ye get hit!
classJeers.ranger: Bet ye couldn't hit a troll if it were standin’ right in front of ye!
classJeers.paladin: With armor that shiny, ye’re just askin' to get hit!
classJeers.sorcerer: Ye cast spells like a goblin casts rocks... badly.
classJeers.druid: Let me guess, ye talk to squirrels and call it magic!

cityResponses.new: New in town? Ha! Bet ye got lost findin' the entrance. The gates are big, ye know!
cityResponses.not_new: Not new? Then why do ye still look like ye belong in a dung heap?

locationJeers.weapon_shop: The weapon shop? Bah! The blacksmith's blind as a bat!
locationJeers.magic_shop: Magic shop? Ye mean that shady corner shop that sells fake amulets?
locationJeers.courthouse: The courthouse? Ye’ll wish ye never walked through those doors!
locationJeers.temple: The temple? Maybe they can heal that terrible fightin’ style of yers!
locationJeers.inn: The inn? Hope ye enjoy a lumpy bed and even lumpier soup!
locationJeers.tavern: The tavern? Hah! Their ale’s as watered down as yer spells!

classJeers.wizard: My granny casts better spells and she's a goblin!
classJeers.fighter: I've seen better swings from a goblin throwin' mud!
classJeers.rogue: More like a rogue that forgot how to sneak!
classJeers.bard: Please don’t sing... my ears couldn’t handle it!
classJeers.cleric: Better heal yerself after that pathetic display!
classJeers.ranger: Ye couldn’t track yer own footsteps!
classJeers.paladin: Ye’re more about showin’ off than fightin’!
classJeers.sorcerer: Ye better practice those spells or ye’ll be toast!
classJeers.druid: Pfft, go hug a tree and leave the fightin’ to us!

cityResponses.new: New, eh? Well, don’t worry, the city’s terrible, ye’ll hate it. I sure do!
cityResponses.not_new: Oh, ye've been here before? Then ye already know how awful it is!

locationJeers.weapon_shop: Weapon shop? Bah! They charge ye double for half a blade!
locationJeers.magic_shop: Magic shop? They sell nothin' but junk. Only magic ye'll get is buyer’s remorse!
locationJeers.courthouse: The courthouse? Ye’ll leave poorer than when ye entered!
locationJeers.temple: Temple? Might as well pray ye don’t get lost on yer way there!
locationJeers.inn: The inn? Hope ye like yer stew with a side of cockroaches!
locationJeers.tavern: The tavern? Their drinks taste like goblin sweat—and that’s on a good day!
